price: 64. Мре bakolobaka na bango ete: Bobenga basangisi na bino, kasi bakoyanola bango te, mpe tango bakomona etumbu, bakolikia ete soki balandaka bokambi.
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ لَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqīla id'ʿū shurakāakum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wara-awū al-ʿadhāba law annahum kānū yahtadūna
